channel.title: Recipe Copier Mod
channel.description:
I think this should be available free at the beginning. Or made available when I first get foundations. I am on another playthrough, but since this is so expensive I still can't afford it. Edit: Finally was able to research it. But I still think it should be mostly free so it can be used when I get foundations. I usually don't need it until then.
About new feature added with version 0.0.5: Copy mode is now 'toggleable' by clicking the right mouse button. Is the Hand Tool still needed for this? Or can I just right click when I am near the machine?
Edit: I get it now. Can you add the information about right clicking to change modes to the "How to use it" section? Thanks.
